rows.label: qev025202_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, how's business? Not great, if the look on your
face says anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Trouble with Ma-non in the stores, eh?
Yeah, that's no surprise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0003
rows.name:
I get new complaints every day. Complaints about
being denied service, or strange health concerns,
or just... Well, you name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0004
rows.name:
Folks are always afraid of stuff that's new.
So incidents like these are to be expected, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0005
rows.name:
But we put everyone who enters the city through a
thorough medical scan. Ma-non, Nopon, everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0006
rows.name:
The fact we let them in tells you we've never found any
pathogens on them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0007
rows.name:
We require regular checkups, too. Epidemiologically
speaking, Ma-non are completely safe to humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0008
rows.name:
I understand people's concerns, but we have to get used
to xenoforms in our city if we hope to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0009
rows.name:
I don't need to tell you that half our military-industrial
complex runs on Ma-non tech. Or that they're the star
of our economy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0010
rows.name:
So go back and tell that store owner that she's nuts if
she thinks the government will take her side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0011
rows.name:
Most people have already come around to this way
of thinking, so she can either get with the times
or get left behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0012
rows.name:
Maintaining friendly relations with the Ma-non is
essential for our survival on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025202_MSG0013
rows.name:
I hope people like your store owner can accept that
sooner rather than later.[ST:wait ]
